Articles.Content:
Hello. This is a megathread for posting pictures of your space stations and pictures of their module-by-module construction. So, in short, preferably post a picture of each module or section being docked (You can post launch pictures, orbit pictures, approach pictures, and final dock pictures.) If you dont have any pictures of your space station being built, just post a picture(s) of the station. List what its name is, what its primary function(s) is, how much crew space, how many crew members, and why you built it. You can also post video(s) of the station construction.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I will be posting a module by module picture contruction gallery of my newest space station, the "Kosmos" Kerbin-International Space Station. It's basically just a more or less replica of the real ISS kerbal-style. This is to show how I made it. It's also part of a best with my freind as to who could build the larger space station with a design scheme. We have the exact same mods on. If anyone wants it I can post alist of the mods I used to build it.

NOTE: Your space station does not have to be stock. And NO HYPEREDIT!

Edited August 27, 2013 by Carter938

And yes I did already post a ISS thread and am aware there are others. To be clear, this one is meant for the purpose of showing off the various ways that players have used multiple smaller spacecraft to assemble larger ones in orbit and NOT to be a simple depository of KSS pictures.

Edited August 27, 2013 by Carter938
I am leaving this message for any Moderators. If nobody replies to this thread please delete it. Thank you.

figured i'd respond to the thread, my station is named SISS, is kind of a WIP right now at 464 parts, reason for building it was to just do it, no real reason. I dont have any build pictures but so far it looks like this;

Edited September 3, 2013 by jscheiben

This is a day or so old. Since then i have added another Orange fuel tank on the same dock as the other tank. I also deorbited the space tugg as it was crap really. Docking mast still to be added and maybe a couple more fuel tanks.

Lag is starting to become an issue. And the crashing of the game too. I was within 1.5mtrs last nite when KSP locked up and crashed. 1hour of docking manuvers down the drain..lol
Shameless thread bumping is frowned upon, even is necessary sometimes.
